Affected individuals typically inherit the SMCHD1 gene mutation from one parent and the ""permissive"" chromosome 4 from the other parent. (Because neither parent has both genetic changes in most cases, they are typically unaffected.)",GHR,facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy
